actions.name: Actions
actions.description:
Multi-Attack: 1×Cutlass and 1×Bite
Bite [Melee Attack]: 3 (d6) and pass [Will] or be cursed with Wererat Lycanthropy.
Weapon [Melee Attack]: 3 (d6) or (by Weapon)

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Shapechanger: This is a form that a Humanlike cursed with lycanthropy can become when the curse takes hold. They revert automatically if they die.
